message: Too salty! Did you dump the whole soy sauce bottle?
This would be better paired with indian mango with all that soy sauce.
Maybe just replace the papaya with mango? Since there's already too much soy sauce.
Whoever eats this will be coughing. Maybe cut the soy sauce next time?
Vinegar is strong! It’s a sour bomb.
Perfect balance! The soy sauce is just right.
Flavor on point! Not bland, not salty—this is real adobo.
It's too sweet for a normal adobo.
A very slippery dish you have here. Maybe lessen the oil next time?
I might feel sick with all the oil.
Why is this dish swimming in oil?
I wish everyone has money to use so much oil as you have.
Sweetness is spot-on, the sugar rounds everything perfectly.
Vinegar hits clean and smooth, no sour bite.
Cooking time nailed! The chicken is tender and juicy.
Excellent job! This adobo tastes like home.
Nice work! But maybe follow the flow next time?
All flavors are balanced; the cooking timeline just took a little detour.
The flavors are spot-on! Next time, try following the order like a master chef.
That vinegar punch is way too aggressive. My mouth is shrinking.
So sour it hurts… did the vinegar slip?
This tastes more like candy than adobo.
My teeth are crying with all this sweetness.
This is painfully salty. Did the salt spill in?
I need water ASAP. The salt level is brutal.
